example.parse: (S (and Mwa- M وَ-) (VP (be/was/were+he/it M-kAna M -كانَ) (NP-1 (the+president/head/chairman MAlr~a}iysu M الرَّئِيسُ) (the+Hariri MAlHariyriy~ M الحَرِيرِيّ)) (VP (PRT ( Mqad M قَد)) (postpone/delay/defer+he/it MOarojaOa M أَرْجَأَ) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- XTX)) (NP-OBJ (NP (travel/trip Msafara- M سَفَرَ-) (its/his M-hu M -هُ)) (PP-DIR (to/towards MIilaY M إِلَى) (NP (the+states/provinces MAlwilAyAti M الوِلاياتِ) (the+united MAlmut~aHidapi M المُتَّحِدَةِ))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (which/who/whom MAl~aXiy M الَّذِي)) (S (VP (be/was/were+he/it MkAna M كانَ) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- XTX)) (ADJP-PRD (decided_upon/stipulated/scheduled Mmuqar~arAF M مُقَرَّراً)) (NP-TMP (yesterday MOamosi M أَمْسِ)))))) (PUNC ,) (PP (to/towards MIilaY M إِلَى) (NP (the+today MAlyawomi M اليَوْمِ))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: his trip to the united states which was planned yesterday
